item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a Post Christmas dinner Tuesday Night Dinner @ The Chateau/Braintree. The Chateau is an Italian Family Dining Experience.

Yelp states the approximate cost for one meal including drink, tax and tip is approximately $11-$30.

This will be a great opportunity to meet and and take a breather from the Holiday rush, and have some time to meetup with other members for a fun evening. Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the meal, including but not limited to, your drinks, food, tax, and tip and any shared items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dinner @ The Chateau/Braintree
Tuesday, December 28th, 2010 @ 6:30pm
535 John Mahar Highway
Braintree, MA 02184
781-380-8770
Website: The Chateau Braintree

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Kathleen/Jeanne."

Organizer(s): Jeanne & Kathleen

Min/Max: Min of 6 people 48 hours in advance. No maximum at this point.

Guests: 1 per Member

Fees: Annual Members and one Guest- FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member ($10 if you are a 2010 Annual Member, a past 2-year Annual Member or Former AO)

RSVP Deadline: 6:30 on Monday, December 27th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page. (Please Note: 2010 Annual Members are allowed to bring ONE GUEST FREE to this event.

Inclement Weather: Please see our Weather policy on the About pages. We will update this section a few days before if the forecast calls for more than light flurries.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Overview: Located behind Shaw's (Pearl Plaza), it's a straight 8-10 minute walk from the Braintree T and about 2 miles from Exit 17 off Route 3.

From Route 3: Take Exit 17/Union Street Braintree. Exit the Rotary heading towards the T station and get in one of the two left lanes. Take a left at the first light so the T is now on your right. You will go straight through 2 sets of lights. After you round the bend after the 2nd set of ligths the entrance to the parking lot will be on your right across from a condo complex. (If you go over the RR tracks you have gone too far.) Pull in, take a left and head towards the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. Late arrivals should ask the host for "Kathleen/Jeanne."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at the Chateau Braintree
